blogPost.excerpt: B.E.P. or Backendless Ecommerce Platform turns any website into a shop with just 1-line of code, no backend or CMS required. Plus, it's free, minus standard processing fees (2.9% + $0.30, per transaction).
blogPost.body: B.E.P. or Backendless Ecommerce Platform turns any website into a shop with just 1-line of code, no backend or CMS required. Plus, it's free, minus standard processing fees (2.9% + $0.30, per transaction).
blogPost.title: B.E.P. - Launch a shop with 1-line of code, no CMS required
blogPost.author: surgieboi

localize.description: B.E.P.或Backendless Ecommerce Platform将任何网站变成商店，只需1行代码，无需后台或CMS。此外，它是免费的，减去标准的处理费用（2.9%+0.30美元，每笔交易）。
localize.tagline: 只需1行代码就能开店，不需要任何内容管理系统

localize.description: B.E.P.或Backendless Ecommerce Platform將任何網站變成商店，只需1行代碼，無需後臺或CMS。此外，它是免費的，減去標準的處理費用（2.9%+0.30美元，每筆交易）。
localize.tagline: 只需1行代碼就能開店，不需要任何內容管理系統

previous.excerpt: Build, share, and track interactive product demos that excite prospects and close more deals. → No engineering required with our no-code solution! → Build engaging feature overviews to share with leads → Share a dynamic leave-behind after the sales call

localize.description: 建立、分享和跟踪互动式产品演示，激发潜在客户的兴趣并达成更多交易。→ 我们的无代码解决方案无需工程设计! → 建立引人入胜的功能概述，与潜在客户分享→在销售电话后分享一个动态的留存信息
localize.tagline: 创建可分享的产品演示

localize.description: 建立、分享和跟蹤互動式產品演示，激發潛在客戶的興趣並達成更多交易。→ 我們的無代碼解決方案無需工程設計! → 建立引人入勝的功能概述，與潛在客戶分享→在銷售電話後分享一個動態的留存信息
localize.tagline: 創建可分享的產品演示

next.excerpt: Create a professional online newsroom. In addition to all the features from Ghost, it has some essential features that turn it into a professional online newsroom such as media kits, press clippings, built-in multi-language capabilities and newsletter options.
next.title: Pressbase - Create professional online newsroom for free

localize.description: 创建一个专业的在线新闻编辑室。除了Ghost的所有功能外，它还有一些必不可少的功能，使其成为一个专业的在线新闻编辑室，如媒体包、新闻剪报、内置多语言功能和通讯选项。
localize.tagline: 免费创建专业的在线新闻编辑室

localize.description: 創建一個專業的在線新聞編輯室。除了Ghost的所有功能外，它還有一些必不可少的功能，使其成爲一個專業的在線新聞編輯室，如媒體包、新聞剪報、內置多語言功能和通訊選項。
localize.tagline: 免費創建專業的在線新聞編輯室
